desc.p: Specifies external routine for profiling the client. This routine takes care of assigning profile information to the customer if it is specified.
: Input must have an entry on EB.API table
Identifies the Profile type is Internal(using PW.TRANSITION) or External(using Insight data).
: 2 values allowed INTERNAL or EXTERNAL Single Value field and Mandatory Input
It holds the Valid Table/Application name. This table must have an @ID of the CUSTOMER id.
: 35 Alphanumeric Character allowed. Input allowed only if CLASSIFICATION field has value as EXTERNAL.
Valid Field Name on the table mentioned in FROM.TABLE should be specified.
: 35 Alphanumeric Character allowed. Single value field. Input allowed only if CLASSIFICATION field has value as EXTERNAL.
Valid Field Name on the table mentioned in FROM.TABLE should be specified.
: 35 Alphanumeric Character allowed. Single value field. Input allowed only if CLASSIFICATION field has value as EXTERNAL.
